definition: time immemorial/origin of the universe/the world
the distant past/ancient times/antiquity/early historical times
Lingbao county level city in Sanmenxia 三門峽|三门峡[San1 men2 xia2], Henan
Dragon mountain/Longshan district of Liaoyuan city 遼源市|辽源市, Jilin/Longshan county in Xiangxi Tujia and Miao autonomous prefecture 湘西土家族苗族自治州[Xiang1 xi1 Tu3 jia1 zu2 Miao2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1]
Three Sovereigns, between Gods and Emperors in third millennium BC/usually listed as Suiren 燧人[Sui4 ren2], Fuxi 伏羲[Fu2 Xi1], trapping and writing, Shennong or Farmer God 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2]
to spread out/to develop/to overflow/to amplify/superfluous
records/book/Taoist written charm/book of prophecy (e.g. of dynastic fortunes)
Fuxi or Fu Hsi, legendary Chinese emperor, trad. 2852-2738 BC, mythical creator of fishing, trapping and writing
Blue Dragon, other name of the Azure Dragon 青龍|青龙 (the seven mansions of the east sky)
